entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.9Â°C

Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 49 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain early in the morning. Rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
